### Ingest data 

series, values, and dates

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source='fold-hide'}

# Load
url_root <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/UN-AVT/kamino-source/main/sources/0-shared/data/"
url_file <- "women-in-space/astronaut-data.csv"
url <- paste0(url_root, url_file)
df <- read.csv(url, header = TRUE)

df

```
### Wrangle

Retrieving unique records of female astronauts using <kbd>distinct()</kbd>

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source='fold-hide'}

# Female astronauts
hrs_mission <- df %>% 
  filter(sex == "female") %>% 
  distinct(name, total_hrs_sum)

hrs_mission

```

Retrieving unique records from the table for the year of mission by using <kbd>distinct()</kbd>

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-show'}

#Astronauts name with the year of mission in ascending order
distinct_df <- distinct(df, name, year_of_mission) %>% arrange( year_of_mission, name)
distinct_df

```
